title: Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 19 of 2023)), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Tailte Éireann Act 2022 (Valuation
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Tailte Éireann Act 2022 (Valuation 

Division) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 24 March 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited tailte eireann act 2022 (valuation division) order 2023 (2) order shall come operation 24 march 2023

title: Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 19 of 2023)), hereby order as follows:
heading: In this Order -
text_norm: 2 order - existing valuation list meaning act 2001 replaced valuation list meaning section 23(5) act 2001 valuation list meaning act 2001

title: Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 19 of 2023)), hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. Where a person wishes to purchase a certified copy extract of an
text_raw:
3. Where a person wishes to purchase a certified copy extract of an 
existing valuation list, a valuation list or a replaced valuation list, the fee 
specified in column 3 of Schedule 1 shall be payable to Tailte Éireann in 
respect of the item specified in column 2 of that Schedule opposite that fee so 
specified.
text_norm: 3 person wish purchase certified copy extract existing valuation list valuation list replaced valuation list fee specified column 3 schedule 1 shall payable tailte eireann respect item specified column 2 schedule opposite fee specified

title: Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 19 of 2023)), hereby order as follows:
heading: 4. Where a person wishes to make an application to Tailte Éireann under
text_raw:
4. Where a person wishes to make an application to Tailte Éireann under 
the Act of 2001, the fee specified in column 3 of Schedule 2 shall be payable to 
Tailte Éireann in respect of the item specified in column 2 of that Schedule 
opposite that fee so specified.
text_norm: 4 person wish make application tailte eireann act 2001 fee specified column 3 schedule 2 shall payable tailte eireann respect item specified column 2 schedule opposite fee specified

title: Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 19 of 2023)), hereby order as follows:
heading: 5. Where a person wishes to purchase a copy of a valuation map or a copy
text_raw:
5. Where a person wishes to purchase a copy of a valuation map or a copy 
of an extract of an archive valuation book specified in column 2 of Schedule 3, 
the fee specified in column 3 of that Schedule shall be payable to Tailte 
Éireann in respect of the item specified in column 2 of that Schedule opposite 
that fee so specified.
text_norm: 5 person wish purchase copy valuation map copy extract archive valuation book specified column 2 schedule 3 fee specified column 3 schedule shall payable tailte eireann respect item specified column 2 schedule opposite fee specified

title: Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 19 of 2023)), hereby order as follows:
heading: 6. Where a person submits a Form C3 to Tailte Éireann, the fee specified
text_raw:
6. Where a person submits a Form C3 to Tailte Éireann, the fee specified 
in column 3 of Schedule 4 shall be payable to Tailte Éireann in respect of the 
item specified in column 2 of that Schedule opposite that fee so specified. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7. Where an item specified in Schedule 1 or 3 requires handling, dispatch 
or postage, Tailte Éireann may charge a fee not exceeding the reasonable costs 
of handling, dispatch or postage. 

[123] 3 

 
 
 
 4 [123]
text_norm: 6 person submits form c3 tailte eireann fee specified column 3 schedule 4 shall payable tailte eireann respect item specified column 2 schedule opposite fee specified notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th march 2023 7 item specified schedule 1 3 requires handling dispatch postage tailte eireann may charge fee exceeding reasonable cost handling dispatch postage 123 3 4 123

title: Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 19 of 2023)), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order sets out the fees payable to Tailte Éireann in respect of the 
performance by it of certain functions.
